net.medcommons
Class IdentityConnection

java.lang.Object
  net.medcommons.IdentityConnection
public class IdentityConnection
extends java.lang.Object

This class maintains a JDBC connection to an identity database, linking SAML-provided users to their MCIDs and medcommons servers.

Constructor Summary

          Prepares a common set of SQL queries.

Method Detail

getMCIDSeed

public long getMCIDSeed(int type)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves the last MCID of a given type. This can then be used as a seed to retrieve the next batch of MCIDs. 
pre: 0 <= type < 10

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

login

public java.lang.String login(java.lang.String mcid,
                              java.lang.String password)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves a URL to the MedCommons server that hosts a particular user's desktop.

The input is a form-provided MCID and raw password. The MCID should be a 16-digit number, stripped of any user-provided spaces or dashes.

The output is a string URL of the form: 'http://something.somewhere/desktop?mcid=XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' Tack additional query parameters at the end, like hashpw or whatever. 

pre: mcid.length() == 16

If the result is null, the login failed. No information about whether the MCID was bad or the password was bad should be given to the user.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

                               throws java.sql.SQLException
Given a source_id, passed in by cookies from our SAML Relying Party server (ex: 'StMungos') return the display string (ex: "Saint Mungo's")

newUser

public java.lang.String newUser(java.lang.String mcid,
                                java.lang.String email,
                                java.lang.String password)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
Creates a new user in the database, given an MCID, an email address, and the un-hashed raw password.

Parameters:
mcid - 16-character raw MCID, stripped of user-provided spaces or dashes
email - E-mail address of user
password - raw user-provided password
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

linkUser

                     java.lang.String source_id,
                     java.lang.String username)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
Link a particular MCID to a SAML-provided incoming user.

Parameters:
mcid - MCID of user
source_id - identity provider as given via cookies by PingFederate
username - external user as given via cookies by PingFederate
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
